data.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
As its name implies, provides more utility functions on list, in
    particular those mentioned in List::Util's manpage under "SUGGESTED
    ADDITIONS".

    Namespace was originally "List::Any" until the suggestion of
    "List::MoreUtils" was made to me.
